metadata.title: CVE-2019-12068 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: In QEMU 1:4.1-1, 1:2.1+dfsg-12+deb8u6, 1:2.8+dfsg-6+deb9u8,1:3.1+dfsg-8~deb10u1, 1:3.1+dfsg-8+deb10u2, and 1:2.1+dfsg-12+deb8u12(fixed), when executing script in lsi_execute_script(), the LSI scsiadapter emulator advances 's->dsp' index to read next opcode. This can leadto an infinite loop if the next opcode is empty. Move the existing loopexit after 10k iterations so that it covers no-op opcodes as well.

criterions.comment: qemu: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
